description: Module that allows to send the logs of the server to a channel.

events.description: Manage the different events you want to show.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: Channel where the logs will be sent.

docs.description: Get the link of the logging module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the logging module.

reset.description: Restores the module settings to the original ones (data can't be recovered).

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
